events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it does not fit as expected. I would like to request a refund or exchange for a different size.
The customer issue was reviewed and categorized as a refund request based on the mention of refund and exchange.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request of the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to arrange a refund or exchange. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and still in its original packaging?
My order number is 789456123. The jacket is unworn and still has the tags attached, packaged exactly as received.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund once you return the jacket via our prepaid shipping label.
That works for me. Please send the shipping label so I can return the jacket as soon as possible.
The prepaid shipping label was emailed to the customer. We confirmed the refund process will begin once the return is received.
Just checking in to ensure you received the shipping label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and sent the jacket back yesterday. Thanks for the smooth process!
The refund was successfully processed and credited to the customer’s original payment method.
The support case was closed after confirmation of the refund payment to the customer.
A customer satisfaction survey invitation was sent to gather feedback regarding the refund experience.
The customer completed the survey and rated their experience as very positive, praising the quick and helpful support.
